channel.title: Rsc pk all day
channel.description:
I'm going torelease this server out as a beta. Before any can :palm: me I will :palm: myself. To all the haters hahaha. But yeah this server is open to pking and staking as I "hear" there are a lot of "pkers" and "stakers" waiting for a new server. If this fails, I guess what can I say right? Hahaha.....Haters gonna keep hating.
Like requested by some noobs... Server XP rate is set at 60% so I don't see the problem about complaining....
[img]http://s30.postimg.org/3vftlq1ep/screenshot0.png[/img] [img]http://s30.postimg.org/4z4jbfbfl/screenshot1.png[/img] [img]http://s30.postimg.org/5px9h7dsx/screenshot2.png[/img]

item.title: Rsc pk all day
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

You will need to look into your InventoryItemOnItem handler or scripting system if you have one.

[code]Stuff = input, output
252 Apple, 254 Apple Pie
final int[][] stuff = { { 252, 254 }, { 132, 255 }, { 236, 256 } };

	if (item1.getID() == 253 || item2.getID() == 253) { //253 is Pie Shell
		for (int i = 0; i < stuff.length; i++) {
			if (stuff[i][0] == item1.getID()
					|| item2.getID() == stuff[i][0]) {
				if (player.getInventory().remove(new InvItem(253)) > -1
						&& player.getInventory().remove(
								new InvItem(stuff[i][0])) > -1) {
					player.getInventory().add(new InvItem(stuff[i][1]));
					player.getActionSender().sendMessage(
							"You create an uncooked pie!");
					player.getActionSender().sendInventory();
					return;
				}
			}
		}
	}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Rsc pk all day
item.dc:creator: @Classickbds Classickbds
item.description:
@Classickbds wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:7, topic:550378”][quote author=slaveofmen link=topic=669289.msg4487904#msg4487904 date=1435449272]

Which source is more stable Moparclassic or noobscape v3 and brutal pkers?

im pretty sure noobscape is the most stable source ive seen.
[/quote]

You’re so against MoparClassic that you are blinded by the fact that Brutal Pkers is more advanced than NoobScapev3. For people who are new to scene, they should probably DL Brutal Pkers rather than any version of EasyRSC or NoobScape. Then from that point work their way up to either a MoparClassic, DarkQuest, Elysium or some other form of advancement.

Edit : Ah my bad ;)[/quote]

Rodger, I’m not too good with Moparclassic because I got everything set except how to load the client. I did try to run it in Visual Studio but was unsuccessful. I gave up after no one replied to the thread I posted. Then I continued from the last point of working on the Brutal Pker’s source. I have a Noobscape source that was a few more quest added but didn’t like the sleep function in Noobscape. For Brutal Pker’s, Yong made it back to the function when you have to type the word. I like this idea to be replaced on the Noobscape source. One unsuccessful bug that I could not fix was when you use the pie crust with a cooking apple and then use a meat pizza with the apple pie and it turns out to be a meat pie. This should not happen, for it should say nothing interesting happen.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsc pk all day
item.dc:creator: @Classickbds Classickbds
item.description:
@Classickbds wrote:

Lol. I forgot about the server being up. I am very busy with work and having a family. I will do my best to post the server online for you guys to play. It’s not really my source because it’s part of the Noobscape V3 and Brutal Pkers source mixed together. I’m just trying to get Yong Ming’s attention but he is also very busy like me. Its been like almost a year since I was able to contact Yong Min. Some of the implementations are my ideas though, like trying to get the bank chest to work and using portable bank certs for special events. I’m like secretly working on the server so that I can release the server and play along with players. Like I said in the advertisement on the server, if you play and stay for more than 3 months you will become admin with limit powers. I will keep you guys updated. Thanks!

-Ckx

Read full topic

wow, this looks fun, don’t get discouraged, keep woking at it. id like to offer you my assistance in and graphics for you website or ingame sprites. just drop me a message and let me know!. P.S. i checked out RSCrival nothing special, but your server looks like an undiscovered gem. keep working, I’m exited to see what happens!
